title: Nouveau dossier (2)
description:
Just a 15-pictures pack of gamers-favorites video games.

Windows 7 users: after opening the torrent, locate the folder you just downloaded, highlight all pictures, right-click and click on set image as background. ^^

All others windows os user: you can't have Aero desktop so you will simply have a good set of wallpapers of gamers-favorites video games.


All other os user ( Mac OS, Linux, Solaris ): i've never tried these os so i guess you will only have a set of wallpapers... or something similar to windows 7 user.
